title: Crunch Kantine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Take-out, British, European, Fusion
description: Vegetarian buffet restaurant and gallery with a few a la carte options as well. Buffet is all-you-can-eat including the soup of the day - could order just soup and bread. Menu changes and is posted on its facebook. Food and desserts are made-in-house with many marked vegan items. Take-out boxes for buffet available.
